name: Love Agency
description:
Love Agency is a boutique, people-centric full-service digital agency based in Sydney. We build enterprise technology products that connect with people through simple, powerful UI design.
We have been at the forefront of mobile development well before the launch of the iPhone. Our deep industry expertise has helped us refine our development processes, so we can deliver releases to market at speed. All our mobile app development is done in-house from our beautiful Sydney office.
